title: The iPod is a relic of an era gone by, and Apple should put it out of its misery
content:

The post The iPod is a relic of an era gone by, and Apple should put it out of its misery appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The iPod is an outdated device type that no longer fits in our modern world. It's long overdue for Apple to discontinue this product lineup.
